author: Rebecca Lawrence For Mailonline
title: Bella Hadid flashes her posterior in sheer pink knickers | Daily Mail Online
text: 655 shares She teamed the garment with a pink top that sheathed her lithe frame. Wearing her raven coloured locks in loose waves, the younger sister of Gigi Hadid smouldered as she gazed down the lens. Catwalk queen: Bella recently revealed she has been kept busy with fittings for the upcoming fashion weeks (pictured at the Marc Jacobs Spring 2017 NYFW show) Bella recently revealed she has been kept busy with fittings for the upcoming fashion weeks. However, she won't be working with Riccardo Tisci, who announced last week that he has stepped down from his position as Creative Director of Givenchy. Devastated by the news, Bella took to Instagram to share a sweet snap of the pair together as she posted a gushing tribute. Sad news: Bella won't be working with Riccardo Tisci, who has stepped down from his position as Creative Director of Givenchy. Devastated, she shared a sweet tribute to him on Instagram She wrote: 'Riccy It has been more than a pleasure for me and I writing this because the past 2 years of working for you & with you have been memories that I will never ever forget& cherish forever!.. 'Any Givenchy campaign or show I would get booked for by you would still make my heart stop from excitement...I have never seen someone work the way you do with a genuine love for the art, design and fashion... 'You are a genius of our generation and I am so proud to call you a friend. A new chapter has started for you amore and I am so excited to see what you will do next. 'I love YOU Brother !! You are an inspiration to me and so many others.. I wish only success for you and @givenchyofficial in the future #riccardoForever @riccardotisci17.' Model of the moment: Whilst she won't be working with Riccardo Tisci anymore, Bella won't be short on offers and will no doubt be walking in the hottest shows at Fashion Week Do it in denim like Bella wearing Dior
